Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Relates to the regulation of ingredients in personal care products
Summary: Relates to the regulation of ingredients in personal care products to include chemicals of concern which shall be provided on lists identified by the commissioner.
LawCode: Add Art 37 Title X §§37-1001 - 37-1011, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the regulation of ingredients in personal care products
